conduits.name: Translucent Image
conduits.description: For the first 5 sec of Fade, you take <dynamic>(-- 5)% - (-- 15)%</dynamic> reduced damage.

conduits.name: Move with Grace
conduits.description: Levitate grants <dynamic>10.0% - 25%</dynamic> increased movement speed.

conduits.name: Clear Mind
conduits.description: Dispel Magic, Purify, and Mass Dispel cost <dynamic>20.0% - 35%</dynamic> less mana.

conduits.name: Charitable Soul
conduits.description: Casting Power Word: Shield on an ally also shields you for <dynamic>10.0% - 25%</dynamic> of the amount for 10 sec.

conduits.name: Light's Inspiration
conduits.description: Desperate Prayer heals you for an additional <dynamic>5.0% - 20%</dynamic> of your maximum health over 5 sec.

conduits.name: Power Unto Others
conduits.description: Power Infusion incurs a <dynamic>5.0 sec - 20 sec</dynamic> reduced cooldown when you cast it on an ally.

conduits.name: Shining Radiance
conduits.description: Power Word: Radiance's healing is increased by <dynamic>5.0% - 20%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Pain Transformation
conduits.description: Pain Suppression also heals your target for <dynamic>10.0% - 25%</dynamic> of their maximum health.

conduits.name: Exaltation
conduits.description: Rapture's duration is increased by 2.0 sec, and its Power Word: Shield enhancement is increased by <dynamic>10.0% - 25%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Lasting Spirit
conduits.description: Guardian Spirit's duration is increased by 2.0 sec, and it increases healing received by an additional <dynamic>10.0% - 25%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Swift Penitence
conduits.description: The damage or healing of your first bolt of Penance is increased by <dynamic>15.0% - 36%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Focused Mending
conduits.description: Prayer of Mending does <dynamic>20.0% - 50%</dynamic> increased healing to the initial target.

conduits.name: Resonant Words
conduits.description: Casting a Holy Word spell increases the healing of your next Heal or Flash Heal by <dynamic>10.0% - 25%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Mental Recovery
conduits.description:
After 

<condition>Mind Bomb</condition>
<dynamic>Mind Bomb</dynamic>

Psychic Scream ends, affected targets' movement speed is reduced by <dynamic>40.0%</dynamic> for 5 sec.

conduits.name: Courageous Ascension
conduits.description: Ascended Blast deals <dynamic>10.0% - 25%</dynamic> increased damage, and Ascended Eruption deals an additional 1% damage per stack of Boon of the Ascended.

conduits.name: Festering Transfusion
conduits.description: Unholy Transfusion lasts 5 sec longer and deals <dynamic>10.0% - 25%</dynamic> more damage and healing.

conduits.name: Fae Fermata
conduits.description: The duration of Fae Guardians is increased by <dynamic>5.0 sec - 20 sec</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Shattered Perceptions
conduits.description: Mindgames lasts an additional 3.0 sec and deals an additional <dynamic>20.0% - 35%</dynamic> damage or healing.

conduits.name: Haunting Apparitions
conduits.description: Your Shadowy Apparitions deal <dynamic>5.0% - 20%</dynamic> more damage.

conduits.name: Mind Devourer
conduits.description: Mind Blast deals <dynamic>5.0% - 20%</dynamic> increased damage and has a 10% chance to make your next Devouring Plague cost no insanity.

conduits.name: Rabid Shadows
conduits.description:
Your 

<condition>Mindbender</condition>
<dynamic>Mindbender</dynamic>

Shadowfiend's attack speed is increased by 20%, and it deals <dynamic>10.0%</dynamic> more damage.

conduits.name: Dissonant Echoes
conduits.description:
While not in Void Form, Mind Flay has a <dynamic>5.0% - 20%</dynamic> chance to allow you to cast Void Bolt. 
While in Void Form, Void Bolt has a <dynamic>5.0%</dynamic> chance to reset the cooldown on Void Bolt.

conduits.name: Holy Oration
conduits.description: Spells that reduce the cooldowns of your Holy Words reduce them by <dynamic>5.0% - 20%</dynamic> more.

covenants.name: Summon Steward
covenants.description:
Call your steward to bring you a Phial of Serenity that can be consumed to restore 20% health and remove all Curse, Disease, Poison, and Bleed effects.

Your Steward additionally offers access to a selection of useful amenities for 4 min.

covenants.name: Purify Soul
covenants.description: Restores 20% health and removes all diseases, poisons, curses, and bleeds affecting you.

covenants.name: Soulshape
covenants.description:
Turn into a Vulpin, teleporting 15 yds forward and increasing your movement speed by 50%. You may reactivate Soulshape every few sec to teleport again.

Lasts 12 sec, or indefinitely while in a rest area.

covenants.name: Flicker
covenants.description: Teleports you forward 15 yds or until reaching an obstacle.

covenants.name: Fleshcraft
covenants.description:
Form a shield of flesh and bone over 4 sec that absorbs damage equal to 20% of your maximum health for 2 min.

Channeling near a corpse claims their essence to grow the shield, up to 50% of your maximum health. This is most effective against powerful enemies.

covenants.name: Door of Shadows
covenants.description: Wend through the shadows, appearing at the targeted location.

covenants.name: Boon of the Ascended
covenants.description:
Draw upon the power of the Ascended for 10 sec, granting you access to <dynamic>Ascended Nova</dynamic>, replacing 

<spec>Shadow</spec>
<dynamic>Mind Flay</dynamic>

<spec>Discipline</spec><spec>Holy</spec>
<dynamic>Smite</dynamic>

 with <dynamic>Ascended Blast</dynamic>, and increasing movement speed by 50%.

Upon expiration, releases an <dynamic>Ascended Eruption</dynamic>:

<dynamic>Explode for up to (352% of Spell power) Arcane damage to enemies and (222% of Spell power) healing to allies within 15 yds, based on number of targets. Damage and healing increased by 3% for each stack of Boon of the Ascended. </dynamic>

covenants.name: Ascended Nova
covenants.description:
Release a powerful burst of anima, dealing (69% of Spell power) Arcane damage to all enemies and (38% of Spell power) healing to up to 6 allies within 8 yds.

Grants 1 stacks of Boon of the Ascended for each target damaged.

covenants.name: Ascended Blast
covenants.description:
Blasts the enemy with pure Anima, causing (260% of Spell power) Arcane damage and healing a nearby ally for 100% of the damage done.

Grants 5 stack of Boon of the Ascended.

$?c3[<dynamic>Generates 6 Insanity.</dynamic>]
][]

covenants.name: Ascended Eruption
covenants.description: Explode for up to (352% of Spell power) Arcane damage to enemies and (222% of Spell power) healing to allies within 15 yds, based on number of targets. Damage and healing increased by 3% for each stack of Boon of the Ascended.

covenants.name: Fae Guardians
covenants.description:
Call forth three faerie guardians to attend your targets for 20 sec.

<dynamic>Wrathful Faerie</dynamic>: Direct attacks against the target restore 0.5% Mana or 3 Insanity. Follows your Shadow Word: Pain.

<dynamic>Guardian Faerie</dynamic>: Reduces damage taken by 10%. Follows your Power Word: Shield.

<dynamic>Benevolent Faerie</dynamic>: Increases the cooldown recovery rate of a major ability by 100%. Follows your 

<spec>Holy</spec>
<dynamic>Flash Heal</dynamic>

<spec>Discipline</spec><spec>Shadow</spec>
<dynamic>Shadow Mend</dynamic>

covenants.name: Unholy Nova
covenants.description:
An explosion of dark energy infects enemies within 15 yds with Unholy Transfusion, and heals up to 6 allies for (119% of Spell power).

 <dynamic>Unholy Tranfusion</dynamic>
<dynamic>Deals (250% of Spell power) Shadow damage over 15 sec. Allies who damage this target are healed for (4% of Spell power).</dynamic>

covenants.name: Mindgames
covenants.description:
Assault an enemy's mind, dealing (300% of Spell power) Shadow damage and briefly reversing their perception of reality.

$?c3[For 5 sec, the next [(Spell power * 450 / 100) * (1 + Versatility)] damage they deal will heal their target, and the next [(Spell power * 450 / 100) * (1 + Versatility)] healing they deal will damage their target.

<dynamic>Reversed damage and healing generate up to 20 Insanity.</dynamic>]
][For 5 sec, the next [(Spell power * 450 / 100) * (1 + Versatility)] damage they deal will heal their target, and the next [(Spell power * 450 / 100) * (1 + Versatility)] healing they deal will damage their target.

<dynamic>Reversed damage and healing restore up to 4% mana.</dynamic>]

legendaries.name: The Penitent One
legendaries.description: Power Word: Radiance has a 50% chance to cause your next Penance to be free and fire 3 extra bolts.

legendaries.name: Clarity of Mind
legendaries.description: During Rapture, Power Word: Shield costs 20% less mana and applies 6 second longer Atonements.

legendaries.name: Kiss of Death
legendaries.description: Reduces Shadow Word: Death's cooldown by 8 sec and causes its damage to trigger Atonement when used on targets below 20% health.

legendaries.name: Shadowflame Prism
legendaries.description:
Mind Blast and Shadow Word: Death cause your 

<condition>Mindbender</condition>
<dynamic>Mindbender</dynamic>

Shadowfiend to teleport behind your target, slashing up to 5 nearby enemies for [.6 * (300% of Spell power)] Shadowflame damage. Each time a rift is triggered, the duration of 

<condition>Mindbender</condition>
<dynamic>Mindbender</dynamic>

Shadowfiend is increased by 1.5 sec.

legendaries.name: Painbreaker Psalm
legendaries.description: Shadow Word: Death consumes 6 sec of Shadow Word: Pain and Vampiric Touch, instantly dealing that damage to the target and generating 10 Insanity.

legendaries.name: Eternal Call to the Void
legendaries.description: Mind Flay and Mind Sear have a chance to spawn a Void Tendril or Void Lasher that channels at your target for 15 sec, generating 3 insanity every 1 sec.

legendaries.name: Flash Concentration
legendaries.description: Each time you cast Flash Heal, Heal has its casting time reduced by 0.1 sec and healing increased by 3%, stacking up to 5 times.

legendaries.name: Harmonious Apparatus
legendaries.description: Circle of Healing reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify, Prayer of Mending reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Serenity, and Holy Fire reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Chastise by 4 sec.

legendaries.name: Cauterizing Shadows
legendaries.description:
When 

<condition>Purge the Wicked</condition>
<dynamic>Purge the Wicked</dynamic>

Shadow Word: Pain expires on a target, 3 allies within 30 yds of the target are healed for (50% of Spell power).

legendaries.name: Divine Image
legendaries.description: When you use a Holy Word spell, you have a chance to summon an image of a Naaru at your side. For 15 sec, whenever you cast a spell, the Naaru will cast a similar spell.

legendaries.name: Vault of Heavens
legendaries.description: Leap of Faith instead causes you to leap to your target, and has 2 charges.

legendaries.name: Crystalline Reflection
legendaries.description: Power Word: Shield instantly heals the target for (42% of Spell power) and reflects 20% of damage absorbed.

legendaries.name: Twins of the Sun Priestess
legendaries.description: Power Infusion also grants you 100% of its effects when used on an ally.

legendaries.name: X'anshi, Return of Archbishop Benedictus
legendaries.description: After Spirit of Redemption expires, you will revive at up to 100% health, based on your effectiveness during Spirit of Redemption. After reviving, you cannot benefit from Spirit of Redemption for 10 min.

legendaries.name: Measured Contemplation
legendaries.description:
For every 15 seconds that you do not cast 

<spec>Holy</spec>
<dynamic>Flash Heal, the healing of your next Flash Heal</dynamic>

<spec>Discipline</spec><spec>Shadow</spec>
<dynamic>Shadow Mend, the healing of your next Shadow Mend</dynamic>

 is increased by 50%.  This effect can stack up to 4 times.

legendaries.name: Talbadar's Stratagem
legendaries.description: While you have Shadow Word: Pain, Devouring Plague, and Vampiric Touch active on the same target, your Mind Blast deals 30% more damage.
